CBSE Class 1 Syllabusmakes the first stage of schooling easy. From here, the journey of a student starts. At this stage, students have a very sharp mind and quick learning ability. They are easily mouldable and can adapt to any environment. So, in these formative years, CBSE Class 1 students should be provided with quality education, which not only helps them in their future ahead but also helps them to explore their abilities. Keeping all these points in mind, the Class 1 Syllabus is designed by the CBSE board. TheCBSE syllabuswill help Class 1 students to become aware about people, things, surroundings, etc.
The students need to be up to date with the latest CBSE Class 1 syllabus 2023-24.  It is then that they feel confident when the lessons begin at school. The CBSE syllabus is simple and aids the little ones of Class 1 to learn alongside having fun.
CBSE Syllabus for Class 1 for All subjects
CBSE Syllabus for Class 1 emphasizes on generating curiosity and interest among CBSE Class 1 students with stories and poetry.  The primary focus is to prepare children in such a way that they can express their viewpoints clearly and confidently. CBSE Syllabus also aims to create interest in students in reading books and developing required language skills. CBSE Syllabus for Class 1 is prescribed the CBSE board. It shares a common goal of scholars of education, teachers and activists to achieve the goal of universalisation of elementary education. The syllabus does not put any burden on children and aims to turn them into free learners. They can exhibit their own talent. Moreover, the syllabus allows children to realise their potential and explore their creativity. The Syllabus for Class 1, consisting of all the subjects, is prepared by the CBSE Board by following the guidelines strictly. The CBSE Class 1 Syllabus covers all the important chapters that students need to study in the respective academic year 2023-2024. Class 1 students are advised to go through the syllabus ofCBSEbefore they dive into their respective studies.
